name: Flight
content:
Description

By sprouting wings, activating an anti-gravity device, focusing telekinetic power, or similar means, the target takes to the skies.

Effect

The target gains a flight speed according to your power level. If the boon is dispelled while the target is still in flight, they plummet to the ground immediately.

Power Level

  • Power Level 5 - The target gains a flight speed of 10'.
  • Power Level 6 - The target gains a flight speed of 30'.
  • Power Level 8 - The target gains a flight speed of 60'.
